s2021: Year 6: The Zheng people came to make peace.
s2031: Year 27: Began to court the king; the king was discourteous.
s2039: Year 2: Zhuang Bo died; his son Cheng was established as Wu Gong.
s2053: Year 8: Exchanged Xu fields; the gentleman criticized it.
s2063: Year 29: With Lu at Beng, exchanged Xu fields.
s2069: Year 9: Third month, great hailstorm with thunder.
s2090: Year 7: The feudal lords defeated us. Our army together with the Wei people attacked Zheng.
s2101: Year 11: The minister Hui requested to kill Huan Gong and sought to become chancellor; the duke did not listen, so he killed the duke.
s2127: Year 33: Used a jade disc to pressure Lu, exchanged Xu fields.
s2133: Year 2: Song bribed with a tripod; it entered the Grand Temple; the gentleman criticized it.
s2149: Year 3: Hui welcomed the woman; the Qi duke sent the woman; the gentleman criticized it.
s2188: Year 38: Younger brother Ta killed Crown Prince Mian. Took his place; the state was chaotic, announced twice.
s2191: Year 37: Attacked Zhou, wounded the king.
s2198: Year 25: The Shan Rong attacked us.
s2201: Year 35: Invaded Sui; Sui practiced good governance and was spared.
s2207: Year 38: Crown Prince Hu rescued Qi; the Qi duke would marry him.
s2220: Year 2: Gave birth to Jing Zhong Quan. The Zhou historian divined that Quan would rule Qi in later generations.
s2233: Year 37: Attacked Sui, could not take it, but made alliance and withdrew troops.
